DataElement.preferredName: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition Digit Span Total Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total scaled score for the Digit Span subtest in the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, Fourth Edition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition Digit Span Total Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale that was published in 2008. It is a test designed to measure intelligence in individuals ranging in age from 16 to 90 years._A subtest of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, 4th Edition that measures working memory, mental manipulation, cognitive flexibility, rote memory and learning, attention, and encoding. The subject is asked to recall  numbers in the same order presented (digit span forward), reverse order (digit span backward), or recall the numbers in ascending order (digit span sequencing)._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale that was published in 2008. It is a test designed to measure intelligence in individuals ranging in age from 16 to 90 years.

Property.preferredName: Digit Span Subtest (WAIS-IV) Total Scaled Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A subtest of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, 4th Edition that measures working memory, mental manipulation, cognitive flexibility, rote memory and learning, attention, and encoding. The subject is asked to recall numbers in the same order presented (digit span forward), reverse order (digit span backward), or recall the numbers in ascending order (digit span sequencing).:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

Concepts.definition: A subtest of the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale, 4th Edition that measures working memory, mental manipulation, cognitive flexibility, rote memory and learning, attention, and encoding. The subject is asked to recall numbers in the same order presented (digit span forward), reverse order (digit span backward), or recall the numbers in ascending order (digit span sequencing).
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: WAIS-IV:Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-Fourth Edition. Pearson, San Antonio, TX, 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for COG study in Rave per request by W.Wong. mc 2/26/15 COG decided not to use this DEC/CDE but to use individual digit span subtests instead. mc 3/9/15 Reusing DEC/CDE for Total Score data per COG request. mc 5/12/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale in the Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale - Fourth Edition.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

DataElement.origin: WAIS-IV:Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-Fourth Edition. Pearson, San Antonio, TX, 2008
DataElement.changeDescription: Created for COG study in Rave per request by W.Wong. mc 2/26/15 COG decided to use individual digit span subtests instead of this total score CDE. mc 3/9/15 Reusing this CDE for total score data as requested by COG. mc 5/12/16
